transform_def.name: dimples2
transform_def.string: let z = 1.0 / complex(p_in.x, p_in.y) result = exp(log(z + sqrt(z + 1.0) * sqrt(z - 1.0))) outside = toVec2(result) scale = 1.0 / length2(outside) inside = vec2(outside.x, -outside.y) * scale in (if gauss_rnd_0 > 0.0 then outside else inside) * weight
